flawed_nl_solution:
Pedro has 100 squares - 60 squares = <<100-60=20>>20 more squares than Jesus.
Pedro has 100 squares - 75 squares = <<100-75=25>>25 more squares than Linden.
Combined Pedro has 20 squares + 25 squares = <<20+25=45>>45 squares more than both Jesus and Linden.
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
